Package index

Data Objects

Randomly Generated Data

dummy_pset `::`()
A PharmacoSet object containing randomly generated data for demonstration purposes.

NCI Data

NCI_ALMANAC_sample_metadata `::`()
A data.frame containing cell-line metadata manually curated as part of the PharmacoSet creation process for the NCI-ALMANAC.
NCI_ALMANAC_treatment_metadata `::`()
A data.frame containing drug metadata manually curated as part of the PharmacoSet creation process for the NCI-ALMANAC.
NCI_ALMANAC_raw `::`()
A data.table containing a subset of interesting drug combinations from the NCI-ALMANAC
NCI60_molecular_data `::`()
A MultiAssayExperiment containing RNA microarray, mircoRNA and RNA sequencing data from the NCI60, subset to cell-lines in NCI-ALMANAC
NCI_ALMANAC_pset `::`()
The final PharmacoSet object containing the multiple parts of the NCI-ALMANAC dataset.
NCI_ALMANAC_TRE `::`()
A TreatmentResponseExperiment containing RNA microarray, mircoRNA and RNA sequencing data from the NCI60, subset to cell-lines in NCI-ALMANAC

GDSC Molecular Profiles

GDSC_gene_identifiers
A data.frame containing the mapping of gene names used in the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) dataset.
GDSC_model_list
A data.frame containing metadata for cell lines used in the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) project.
GDSC_drivers
A data.frame containing a subset of cell lines and driver mutations from the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) dataset.
GDSC_rnaseq
A data.frame containing a subset of cell lines and RNA-seq data from the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) dataset.
GDSC_methylation_model_list
A data.frame containing cell line Sentrix array metadata for the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) dataset.
GDSC_methylation
A data.frame containing methylation beta values for cell lines from the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) dataset.
GDSC_drug_response
A data.frame containing drug response data for the Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) dataset.

CCLE Molecular Profiles

CCLE_model_list
A data.frame containing metadata for cell lines used in the Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia (CCLE) project.
CCLE_chromatin
A data.frame containing global chromatin profiling of histone marks for the Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia (CCLE) dataset.
CCLE_rrpa
A data.frame containing protein expression data for the Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia (CCLE) dataset.
CCLE_metabolomics
A data.frame containing metabolite expression data for the Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia (CCLE) dataset.
